infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to find nearby games and provide weather information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to find nearby games and provide weather information even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to the photo library to allow users to set profile pictures.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Catchapp to use your location for finding nearby games and providing weather information.
